title: Progress on Infrastructure Deal, The Rise of Digital Pharmacies
itunes:title: Progress on Infrastructure Deal, The Rise of Digital Pharmacies
description:
Former Transportation Secretary Rodney Slater discusses the progress of President Biden’s proposed infrastructure deal. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Health Care Reporter Angelica LaVito discuss the story “Digital Pharmacies Filling Orders Online Go After CVS, Walgreens.” Bloomberg News Finance Reporter Hannah Levitt talks about JPMorgan bosses predicting that banks’ long trading slump is gone for good. And we Drive to the Close with John Traynor, CIO at People's United Advisors.

Host: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Doni Holloway. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
